Bava#tiq vyaci#ShThaqmanna(gm)# raBaqsaM ~MvidA#naqmityAqhA &nna#mEqvA&smai$ svadayatiq 
sarva#masmai svadatEq ya EqvaM ~MvEdA &&*tvA# jiGarmiq vaca#sA GRuqtEnEtyA#haq tasmAqd-yat puru#ShOq mana#sA-&BiqgacCa#tiq tad-vAqcA va#datya raqkShasEtyA#haq rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyaiq marya#SrIH spRuhaqyad-va#rNO aqgnirityAqhA-pa#citimEqvA-&smi#n dadhAqtya-pa#citimAn Bavatiq ya EqvaM - [  ] 13
